title: Crab balls with tomato sauce
description: Homemade tomato sauce and cheat’s confit tomato make delicious accompaniments to deep fried crab fritters in this impressive starter.
ingredients: olive oil, to cover a small pan
1 thumb-sized piece root ginger, peeled and finely grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
vegetable oil, for deep fat frying
75g/2½oz plain white flour, seasoned with salt and pepper
